data.comment: Today's referee, Koichiro Fukushima, has blown to start the match.
Gamba have a goal kick.
In the minute 2, Hiroshima's Shunki Higashi gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Gamba a goal kick.
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Gamba will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Hiroshima.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
In the minute 7, Koichiro Fukushima awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in the half of Gamba.
Can Hiroshima capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 9, Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a throw-in for Hiroshima, close to Gamba's area.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Gamba at EDION Stadium.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
In the minute 12, Hiroshima drive upfield and Yuya Asano gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gamba defender.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 13, Koichiro Fukushima awards the away team a throw-in.
Gamba are caught offside.
Hiroshima have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 14, Koichiro Fukushima signals a Hiroshima throw-in in Gamba's half.
In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
In the minute 16, Shu Kurata is on target to give Gamba a 0-1 advantage.
It's now 0-2 in Hiroshima as Patric scores for Gamba.
Great play from Shu Kurata to set up the goal.
In the minute 21, Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hiroshima to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Hiroshima just outside Gamba's area.
In the minute 24, Toshihiro Aoyama hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Hiroshima!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Hiroshima.
Goal kick for Gamba at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Gamba at EDION Stadium.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 30, It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Throw-in Gamba.
In the minute 35, Hiroshima's Yuya Asano gets in a shot on goal at EDION Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Ademilson for Gamba is whistled offside.
In the minute 37, Gamba have a goal kick.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Gamba in Hiroshima.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Tsukasa Morishima (Hiroshima) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
In the minute 41, Douglas Vieira's header is off-target for Hiroshima.
Koichiro Fukushima awards Gamba a goal kick.
Free kick Gamba.
In the minute 43, Goal kick for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
Koichiro Fukushima awards the away team a throw-in.
In Hiroshima Hiroshima drive forward through Yuya Asano. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Hiroshima apply pressure at EDION Stadium and Hayato Araki goes close with a header against the post.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Gamba.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Hiroshima.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a Gamba throw-in in Hiroshima's half.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Gamba in the half of Hiroshima.
Gamba drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
The first-half is over at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Gamba.
Free kick Hiroshima.
In the minute 48, Hayao Kawabe gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hiroshima.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
In the minute 50, Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
Can Hiroshima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
Gamba needs to be cautious. Hiroshima have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 54, Can Gamba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Hiroshima's half?
Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Hiroshima Hiroshima attack through Yoshifumi Kashiwa. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 56, Gamba have a goal kick.
Goal kick for Gamba at EDION Stadium.
Rhayner is replacing Toshihiro Aoyama for the home team.
In the minute 60, Hiroshi Jofuku is making the team's second substitution at EDION Stadium with Leandro Pereira replacing Tsukasa Morishima.
Hiroshi Jofuku (Hiroshima) is making a third substitution, with Yusuke Chajima replacing Shunki Higashi.
The away team replace Ademilson with Takashi Usami.
In the minute 62, Takashi Usami for Gamba drives towards goal at EDION Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Gamba have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
In the minute 64, Koichiro Fukushima awards Gamba a goal kick.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Gamba.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Hiroshima.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Gamba to take a throw-in in Hiroshima territory.
In the minute 68, Gamba push forward at EDION Stadium and Takashi Usami gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hiroshima defence.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
Throw-in Hiroshima.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Gamba close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Hiroshima in their own half.
Throw-in for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 70, Goal! A headed strike from the home team reduces their deficit to 1-2. Leandro Pereira got above everyone else to nod it in.
Yoshifumi Kashiwa with an assist there.
Throw-in for Hiroshima at EDION Stadium.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Patric for Gamba gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
Hiroshima's Leandro Pereira breaks free at EDION Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
In the minute 76, Goal kick for Gamba at EDION Stadium.
Kazuma Watanabe is on a sub for Patric for Gamba.
Gamba make their third substitution with Yuya Fukuda replacing Shu Kurata.
In the minute 78, Gamba have a goal kick.
In Hiroshima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Hiroshima are pushing forward but Leandro Pereira's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 81, Koichiro Fukushima awards Gamba a goal kick.
Hiroshima make their fourth substitution with Kodai Dohi replacing Yuya Asano.
Free kick for Hiroshima in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 83, Takashi Usami (Gamba) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Hiroshima.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Hiroshima close to the penalty box.
In the minute 85, Hiroshima drive forward but Leandro Pereira is judged offside.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Hiroshima.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hiroshima's half?
In the minute 87, Hiroshima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Hiroshima.
Goal kick for Gamba at EDION Stadium.
Throw-in for Hiroshima in their own half.
Hiroshima pushes forward through Douglas Vieira, whose finish on goal is saved.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Hiroshima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Hiroshima needs to be cautious. Gamba have an attacking throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Hiroshima goal kick.
Koichiro Fukushima signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Hiroshima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hiroshima have been awarded a corner by Koichiro Fukushima.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
The away team have replaced Kosuke Onose with Shuhei Kawasaki. This is the fourth substitution made today by Tsuneyasu Miyamoto.
